name: music-bridge
description: TypeScript Hono + Astro monorepo with Docker support

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter web clean
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter backend type-check && pnpm --filter web type-check
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter web lint
